Class DialogProgressListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • ProgressListener

  • public class DialogProgressListener
extends ProgressListener
    cz.zcu.kiv.multiclouddesktop.dialog/DialogProgressListener.java

    Progress listener dialog that displays the progress in a progress bar.

    1.0
    Author:
    Jaromír Staněk
